name: Bubbler AR
description:
Do you remember the time, when you last had fun with soap bubbles?

Now you can do this just using your device.

Tap on the screen to start bubbling - or use it like a real soap bubbles gadget by blowing into the microphone.

There are lovely animal bubbles, that will leave you astunning. Tap on such a bubble to let it explode.

The geometric mode lets you create impossible bubbles, you have never seen before - check that out.

This app was designed and made for children - parents might like it as well…

For perfects results give the app some seconds to "warm-up" by scanning your environment in different directions. Give the intro sequence its time to terminate.

History:
v.1.0.0
initial app - just create Bubbles

v.1.5.0
bubbles come with a fancy, natural wobbling

v.1.7.5
create animal and geometric bubbles, cast shadows, extended wobbling

v.2.0.0
better lighting, shadow casting through transparency, multi-peer feature, 3D face-mesh
